DOC.brief_summary: Red yeast rice capsule ( LipoCol Forte ) nature product demonstrate significant cholesterol lower effect might cause addictive and/or synergistic effect lovastatin ( monacolin K ) monacolins substances capsule . The usual dose red yeast rice capsule ( LipoCol Forte ) hypercholesterolemia one capsule twice/day . However , pharmacokinetic profile red yeast rice capsule ( LipoCol Forte ) still unknown . The objective study evaluate pharmacokinetic profile red yeast rice capsule ( LipoCol Forte ) administer single multiple dose healthy subject .
DOC.brief_title: Pharmacokinetic Drug Interaction Study Red Yeast Rice Capsules
DOC.detailed_description: This study divide two group , single multiple dose group . In single dose group , subject receive one , two four red yeast rice capsule feed state period one three , respectively . In multiple dos group , subject receive red yeast rice capsule feed state twice daily 4.5 day . There minimum 5-days washout period crossover treatment . In single dose treatment , blood sample draw prior dose , 0.5 , 1 , 1.5 , 2 , 2.5 , 3 , 4 , 6 , 8 12 hour dose . In multiple dos treatment , blood sample draw prior 1st dosing , prior 7th dosing , prior 8th dosing , prior 9th dosing , 0.5 , 1 , 1.5 , 2 , 2.5 , 3 , 4 , 6 , 8 12 hour 9th dosing .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Subjects must age 2040 year old good health basis medical history , physical examination , electrocardiogram , chest Xray , routine laboratory evaluation . 2 . Vital sign ( 3 minute rest upright position ) within follow range : Ear body temperature 35.037.5 degree celsius ( Â°C ) . Systolic blood pressure , 90140 millimeter mercury ( mm Hg ) . Diastolic blood pressure , 5090 millimeter mercury ( mm Hg ) . Pulse rate , 5090 beat per minute ( bpm ) . Fasting blood glucose , < 110 milligram per deciliter ( mg/dL ) . 3 . Body weight must 50 kilogram ( kg ) within 20 +20 % ideal body weight . 4 . Able sign inform consent prior study . 1 . Use prescription medication within 14 day prior dose . 2 . Use overthecounter medication vitamin within 14 day prior dose . 3 . Participation clinical investigation within 3 month prior dose longer required local regulation . 4 . Donation loss 500 milliliter ( mL ) blood within 3 month prior dose . 5 . Significant illness within 2 week prior dose . 6 . Presence cardiovascular disease . 7 . Presence gastrointestinal disease . 8 . Presence asthma lung disease . 9 . Presence liver disease liver injury . 10 . Presence impair renal function . 11 . Presence neurological disease . 12 . Presence psychiatrical disease . 13 . Subject know Human Immunodeficiency Virus ( HIV ) infect . 14 . A known hypersensitivity lovastatin analog . 15 . History drug alcohol abuse within 12 month prior dose . 16 . Permanent confinement institution . 17 . Individuals judge investigator coinvestigator undesirable subject reason .
